original_text: For Jesus had commanded the impure spirit to come out of the man. Many times it had seized him, and though he was chained hand and foot and kept under guard, he had broken his chains and had been driven by the demon into solitary places.
korean_text: 이는 예수께서 이미 더러운 귀신을 명하사 그 사람에게서 나오라 하셨음이라 (귀신이 가끔 그 사람을 붙잡으므로 그를 쇠사슬과 고랑에 매어 지켰으되 그 맨 것을 끊고 귀신에게 몰려 광야로 나갔더라)

sentences.original_text: For Jesus had commanded the impure spirit
to come out of the man
Many times it had seized him
and though he was chained hand and foot
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 손발이 쇠사슬에 묶였음에도 불구하고

sentences.original_text: and had been driven by the demon
